alert.note: Alert for Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jefferson Davis and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 315 AM CDT... At 244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Charles Regional Airport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Iowa, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Holmwood, Carlyss and Bell City. This includes Interstate 210 between mile markers 2 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
